bot.start.desc: Hello, I exist to preserve our shared memories, thoughts, experiences and reflections.
bot.answer.thanks.for.listening: Thank you for not being silent
bot.answer.refuse.for.user:
Ok, your memories will remain secret.
If you wish, you can agree later with /{{command}}
bot.answer.refuse.for.curator: {{name}} {{userId}} has revoked consent to the use of materials
bot.answer.dont.refuse: Don't worry, your memories are a secret
bot.answer.consent.exist: Thank you, we already have your consent. More here /{{command}}
bot.answer.dont.understand: Sorry, I don't understand such messages yet
bot.consent.disagree: No, they are just for me
bot.what.you.name: What's your name?
